sentences.sentence: Words can be your salvation. Words can also be your damnation.
sentences.translation: 你的话会拯救你，也会成为你的诅咒。

sentences.sentence: They were a holy lot, with the emphasis on hellfire and damnation.
sentences.translation: 他们是一群虔诚的人，强调地狱邪火和诅咒。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps it was more of a damnation than a redemption, after all.
sentences.translation: 说到底，这不是一种救赎，而是一个诅咒。
